alert.note: Alert for Geary; Morris; Wabaunsee (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 9:59AM CDT until May 15 at 10:30AM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Geary County in east central Kansas... Northeastern Morris County in east central Kansas... Southwestern Wabaunsee County in east central Kansas... * Until 1030 AM CDT. * At 959 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles north of Dwight, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Emergency management. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Council Grove, Grandview Plaza, Alta Vista, Dwight, Volland and Council Grove Lake. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 301 and 309. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
